parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True for Direction 1, false for Direction 2

title: ISweepFeatureData.GetWallThickness
description: Gets the wall thickness, forward (Direction 1) or reverse (Direction 2), of this thin-walled sweep feature.

parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True for Direction 1, false for Direction 2

remarks:
This method is:
valid only if
ISweepFeatureData::IsThinFeature
is true.
not valid for swept-surface features.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
